thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 10 of 171
thread.title: Jai

author: Jai
title: Jai
text:
I was only introduced to this site late 2016 and I honestly think it changed my life. I hated leaving my pup at Kennels as she is a little anxious and stresses.
I now can have a catch up with the person / people / family before I accept and I leave my pup in her home environment.
I have had three experiences so far and have been thoroughly amazed with the experience.
I now tell everyone about it!
